sourceOfFunds.purpose: INTRODUCTION : Motivated by the spirit of social service, a few same minded people joined together to establish the development organization. The organization named “Maharaja Agrasen Public School Avom Shiksha Samiti” is a registered philanthropic organization which was established with a mission to welfare of the weaker section of the society through its various development approaches.

NURSERY AND BALWARI: This activity was done with the objective to bring children of formal schools Crèche and Balwari centers at common intervals. “Maharaja Agrasen Public School Avom Shiksha Samiti” was organized three and Nursery

ENVIRONMENT AWARENESS CAMP: “Maharaja Agrasen Public School Avom Shiksha Samiti” organization is organized an environment Camp. There is a consistent fear to lose their livelihood among rag pickers of Delhi as the M.C.D and Noida U.P. was privatised collection and segregation of waste in 6 out of 12 zones so far. As the result, private contractors have been working in these zones.

WOMEN AWARENESS CUM EMPOWERMENT: “Maharaja Agrasen Public School Avom Shiksha Samiti” Orgnized Women Awareness Camp in the community. The women who are supposed to play the vital role in the development family’s family members are being neglected by middle by lower income group families and their role remains limited to complete the household activities like cooking food and other activities.
